metadata.title: CVE-2023-1838 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in vhost_net_set_backend indrivers/vhost/net.c in virtio network subcomponent in the Linux kernel dueto a double fget. This flaw could allow a local attacker to crash thesystem, and could even lead to a kernel information leak problem.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
